full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Web Architect Services
#### Reference Number: W8486-249250/A

This tender announcement invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of one (1) Web Architect, Level 3, under Stream 1, Applications Services. The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks to establish a contract for three (3) initial years, with the option to extend the term by up to two (2) one-year option periods.

### Key Dates

* Tender Closing Date: September 19, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: September 19, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

### Description of Services

The required services include the provision of Web Architect, Level 3, to support the development and maintenance of web applications. The successful supplier will be responsible for designing and implementing web solutions that meet the department's requirements.

### Pre-qualified Suppliers

Only the following suppliers who have been pre-qualified under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Service (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number EN578-170432 are eligible to participate in this tender:

[List of pre-qualified suppliers remains the same]

### Additional Information for Bidders

For services requirements, bidders must provide the required information as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation. Security requirements associated with this requirement include a security clearance level of Secret. Bidders should refer to Part 6 – Security and Other Requirements for more information.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries regarding this tender, please contact:

* Name: Kelsey Lawrence
* Email: kelsey.lawrence2@forces.gc.ca

### Notice of Procurement

The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Notice of ProposedProcurement

This tender announcement is a formal invitation to suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of Web Architect, Level 3, services.

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Documents

RFP documents will be emailed directly to the qualified supply arrangement holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement. Bidders are advised that the RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS).

#### Method of Supply

The Task-Based Informatics Professional Service (TBIPS) method of supply provides suppliers with an ongoing opportunity to become pre-qualified for participation in future bidding opportunities. For more information on how to become a pre-qualified supplier
